cardAlt: the tattoo shop of TT661 Tatto
cardContent: Artist Luna Webber works in this field for almost ten years. She always draws attention to details which makes her a great choice for working with your own designs. As she likes to take a surgeon-like approach when working with you to create great art, you are really in good hands.

cardAlt: the tattoo shop of Fall Lake
cardIntro: 3+ years in business | Capitol Hill, WA
cardContent: The artists at this tatto shop take good care of their clients and provides their needs. If you are not sure, just go for a consultation. You won't regret!

cardAlt: the tattoo shop of Moonlight Ink
cardContent: This is such a clean place. Artists are very professional. They want to work with you to offer what you want. Got good quality tattoos several times from this place :)
